meanings.sent1: The nondeforming material remained unchanged after being pressed.
meanings.sent2: The nondeforming rubber band kept its original shape even after stretching.
meanings.sent3: The nondeforming clay refused to be molded, much to the sculptor's frustration.
meanings.sent4: Her nondeforming resolve was like a solid rock in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The nondeforming steel beam stood strong against the force of the storm.

meanings.sent1: The nondeforming plastic toy looked the same as when it was first bought.
meanings.sent2: The nondeforming building maintained its integrity even after years of harsh weather.
meanings.sent3: The nondeforming cookie cutter always produced perfectly shaped cookies.
meanings.sent4: His nondeforming routine kept him grounded in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The nondeforming diamond sparkled with unchanging brilliance.
